scenario: I want to adopt a young spayed male dog from a private owner near zip 33109 and prepare it for competition. To plan training and possible entries, I also need to locate obedience trials in New York happening within the next month.
combined_task: Locate adoptable young spayed male dogs cared for by private owners within 50 miles of zip 33109 and identify obedience trials in New York in the next month so I can plan training and entries.
selected_subtasks: Search for a young spayed male dog cared for by a private owner within 50 miles of zip 33109.
Find obedience trials in the state of New York in the next month.
